author: Nick Nairn
method: Place the lime juice, honey and mint into a small food processor and blend until smooth. Pour the mixture into a bowl, add the melon balls and walnuts and mix well to coat. To serve, pour the mixture into the empty melon shell 'bowl'.
ingredients: ½ lime, juice only,  1 tbsp runny honey,  1 tbsp fresh mint leaves,  ½ cantalope melon, small rounds cut out with a melon baller, the skin left as a complete 'bowl',  50g/1¾oz whole walnuts,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
